content: 525 yds main color and 140 yds second color needed for striped bag thank you to my pattern testers dadevillechick chanti corirallen britnlind deliriousknitter and stickster **note ** the pattern is written so that in round 9 you slip_stitch into a corner but i altered this when making the pattern myself and i slip_stitch into the center st of the short end of the base so that the seam goes up the side
